product_name: Louis Garneau Comp Tri Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed for the beginning triathlete, the men's Louis Garneau Comp Tri Shorts offer compressive Powerband leg cuffs for muscle support and a minimal built-in chamois for comfort. Ergonomic 12-panel fit. Fabric wicks moisture and dries fast. Powerband compressive cuffs reduce lower-leg pressure, provide support and won't restrict circulation. Smooth flatlock seams; elastic waist with stretchy drawstring. Reflective accents on back and bottom. Louis Garneau Comp Bike Shorts have 1 mesh back pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Designed for the beginning triathlete, the men's Louis Garneau Comp Tri Shorts offer compressive Powerband leg cuffs for muscle support and a minimal built-in chamois for comfort.
